title: iJustine
summary: Justine Ezarik (/iːˈzɛər.ɪk/ ee-ZAIR-ik; born March 20, 1984) is an American YouTuber, host, author, and actress.[2] She is best known as iJustine, with over one billion views on her YouTube channel.[3] She gained attention as a lifecaster who communicated directly with her millions of viewers on her Justin.tv channel, ijustine.tv.[4] She acquired notability in roles variously described as a "lifecasting star",[5] a "new media star",[6] or one of the Internet's most popular lifecasters.[7] She currently posts videos on her main channel iJustine.[8]
